def.dt: :a picture or likeness obtained by photography
:to appear as an image in a photograph an actress who photographs well

entry.et: Semën D. Kirlian †1978 and Valentina Kh. Kirlian †1971 Soviet inventors

def.dt: :a process in which an image is obtained by application of a high-frequency electric field to an object so that it radiates a characteristic pattern of luminescence that is recorded on photographic film
